name: Ext_R4B_ActivityDefinition_observationRequirement
title: Cross-version Extension for R4B.ActivityDefinition.observationRequirement for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version extension represents ActivityDefinition.observationRequirement from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ActivityDefinition|4.3.0 for use in FHIR R5.

element.short: What observations are required to perform this action
element.definition: Defines observation requirements for the action to be performed, such as body weight or surface area.
element.comment: `ActivityDefinition.observationRequirement` maps to R5 `ActivityDefinition.observationRequirement`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
